title: About me
text:
Hello! I’m Sam, a PhD candidate in the Riginos Lab at The University of Queensland. I use genomcis to study hybridisation and adaptation. I’m learning how to make a webpage to share my research, more coming soon!!


Research interests
I use marine systems and genomics,


Education
BSc (Hons.) (2018-2021) The University of Queensland (Australia)
